title: Quest Musou - Ore Dake Ga Tsukaeru Cheat Skill
alternative_title: クエスト無双ー俺だけが使えるチートスキルー ; Peerless Quest – The Cheat Skill Only I Can Use
status: クエスト無双ー俺だけが使えるチートスキルー ; Peerless Quest – The Cheat Skill Only I Can Use
description:
Description :
        Using the cheat skill only I can use, “Quest Board”, a seemingly average high school student fights his way through a myriad of incidents! A modern battle fantasy!“Congratulations! You have been selected to be a lab rat for God’s ability verification experiment.” Masago, a high school student who has no particular hobbies, and spends his days lazing around, suddenly acquires the ability, “Quest Board”. Driven by curiosity, Masago carries out quests given by God and acquires various skills and items. Out of nowhere, he is involved in various incidents!With the cheat skills that only Masago can use, will he be able to face the monsters that appear in the real world and keep clearing the quests?!
